title: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty
summary: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty[lower-alpha 2] is a 2001 stealth game developed by Konami Computer Entertainment Japan and published by Konami. Released on November 13, originally for the PlayStation 2,[1] it is the fourth Metal Gear game written and directed by Hideo Kojima, the seventh overall game in the series and is a direct sequel to the original Metal Gear Solid. An expanded edition, titled Metal Gear Solid 2: Substance[lower-alpha 3], was released the following year for Xbox and Microsoft Windows in addition to the PlayStation 2. A remastered version of the game was later included in the Metal Gear Solid HD Collection for the PlayStation 3, PlayStation Vita, and Xbox 360.
